item.title: Problem with traffic entering Main Pittville Crescent Lane, from the short interleafing T junctiin, 19th February
item.description:
Traffic does not yield at this T junctiin, causing many near misses. Its a blind corner and Highways insists on leaving the road as a two way. There IS going to be an accident. Cars travelling from Allbert Rd side cant see cars coming in past Pittville Crec Lane (pcl) no 1 and 3. And cars coming from this direction are increasingly ignoring the yield road markings. Vehicles also take this corner too fast Made worse as there is no double yellow line preventing cars parking right up to yield sign markings PLEASE PLEASE can this dangerous corner beb addressed. Suggestion: erect signs to say that this road is for resudents only - this will natirally reduce the traffic speeding through as a short cut PLEASE ADVISE HOW WE CAN GET URGENT ACTION ON THIS CORNER.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Pittville Crescent Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked, flooding across road, 19th February
item.description:
As all the other drains in the immediate area are coping with the rain, I would suggest there is not a system problem as suggested by the response from GCC, but instead a very specific issue with the drain. This is surely deserving of inspection rather than doubtful explanations.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Swindon Lane, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stand-alone metal sign in road, 19th February
item.description:
I reported a dangerous, jutting out piece of road, with no bollard, back in December, following at least two cars which had damaged tyres parking outside our house. I was informed this was sorted. Sorted appears to mean a permanent feature of a metal triangle sign on the pavement. The actual problem is still there but it’s just highlighted with a sign which frequently blows, falls, gets moved. This is a dangerous piece of pavement which could easily result in more car damage and or injury to cyclists. Please just replace the bollard or remove this jutting out piece of pavement. Don’t just leave a roadworks sign. It’s not a permanent solution.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185, Hewlett Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
